definition: Li Zhaoxing (1940-), former PRC foreign minister
plum
surname Li
at first/devise/originate
star/heavenly body/satellite/small amount

sentences.english: Li emphasized that cooperation is an effective tool to cope with the challenges faced by mankind.
sentences.chinese: 李肇星強調，合作是應對人類共同挑戰的有效途徑。

sentences.english: Foreign Minister Li Zhaoxing and other officials were present at the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 外交部長李肇星等會見時在座。

sentences.english: Li Zhaoxing said that China-Nepal relations are ever lasting.
sentences.chinese: 李肇星說，中尼友好關係源遠流長。

sentences.english: Li was satisfied with the development of bilateral relations.
sentences.chinese: 李肇星對中瑞關係的發展表示滿意。

sentences.english: Li Zhaoxing said that China-Russia relations have yielded pleasing results this year.
sentences.chinese: 李肇星表示，中俄關系今年又取得可喜成果。

sentences.english: Ferrero-Waldner agreed with Li's assessment of bilateral relations.
sentences.chinese: 瓦爾德納贊同李肇星對中奧關係的評價。

sentences.english: Li Zhaoxing conveyed to her the cordial greetings from Chinese President Hu Jintao.
sentences.chinese: 李肇星向她轉達了中國國家主席胡錦濤的親切問候。

sentences.english: Li said that in recent years, China-Georgia economic and trade cooperation has enjoyed rapid development.
sentences.chinese: 李肇星說，近年來，中格經貿合作發展迅速。

sentences.english: Prior to this meeting, Li also held talks with Somsavat, Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister of the Laos.
sentences.chinese: 此前，李肇星與老撾副總理兼外長宋薩瓦舉行了會談。

sentences.english: Li Zhaoxing thanked Zahir for his contribution to the traditional friendship between China and Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 李肇星感謝查希爾爲發展中阿傳統友誼所作的貢獻。

sentences.english: Thirdly, can you bring us up to date on Foreign Minster Li Zhaoxing's visit to Europe?
sentences.chinese: 第三，請介紹李肇星外長訪歐的情況。

sentences.english: Li stressed people's interest and world peace represent two most valuable things on earth.
sentences.chinese: 李肇星強調，人民的利益和世界的和平最爲美好。

sentences.english: Foreign Minister Li Zhaoxing will meet with him on the sideline of the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 會議期間，李肇星外長將與他會面。

sentences.english: On the same day, Li also held talks with Lithuanian Foreign Minister Antanas Valionis.
sentences.chinese: 同日，李肇星還與立陶宛外長瓦廖尼斯舉行了會談。

sentences.english: Li said "distance cannot separate true friends who feel so close even when they are thousands of miles apart".
sentences.chinese: 李肇星說，“相知無遠近，萬里尚爲鄰”。

sentences.english: Li said that Fiji was the first Pacific Island country to establish diplomatic ties with China.
sentences.chinese: 李肇星表示，斐濟是最早同中國建交的太平洋島國。

definition: Sha Zukang (1947-), Chinese diplomat
Kevin Rudd (1957-), Australian politician, proficient in Mandarin, prime minister 2007-2010 and 2013
Tang Jiaxuan (1938-), politician and diplomat
Qiao Guanhua (1913-1973), PRC politician and diplomat
Li Lanqing (1932-), PRC politician
Qian Qichen (1928-2017), former Chinese vice premier
Dai Bingguo (1941-), a Chinese politician and professional diplomat
Zhu Rongji (1928-), PRC politician, premier 1998-2003
Jiang Zemin (1926-), politician, president of PRC 1993-2003
Hu Jintao (1942-), General Secretary of the CCP 2002-2012, president of the PRC 2003-2013
Shen Guofang (1952-), PRC assistant minister of foreign affairs (2003-2005)
Ji Chaozhu (1929-2020), Chinese diplomat
Yang Jiechi (1950-), Chinese politician and diplomat, foreign minister of PRC 2007-2013
to give a speech
Wu Yi (1938-), one of four vice-premiers of the PRC State Council
Henry Kissinger (1923-), US academic and politician, Secretary of State 1973-1977
